Row.Text: Popularize the "Dojyan" Gesture

Sometimes, all it takes is a simple gesture and a single word to make your popularity skyrocket. You're already popular with both your constituents and your cabinet. But by making a conscious effort to punctuate your speeches and even simple press reports with your trademark "Dojyan!" onomatopoeia paired with a shrug, it is sure to help you become embedded in the public consciousness. Declare Winter Catfish Etouffee as the National Dish

The phrase "docile like the winter catfish" is a term which has become ubiquitous in your country, roughly meaning "putting up no resistance at all." It has made the actual winter catfish a rather popular food item. Your Origins in the Civil War

It is well known that, in the previous world timeline, you stumbled upon the Corpse's Heart while in service during the Civil War. But one thing is quite unclear, and that is: which side did you actually fight for?
The Union.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Permanent -10% Unhappiness and +25 border growth speed[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Permanent penalty of -25% Worker Speed[ENDCOLOR]
Was the answer ever in doubt? You, of course, fought for the Union against those racist curs who would dare secede from such a great nation.
The Confederacy.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free Settler and Worker[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Permanent penalty of -10% [ICON_HAPPINESS_4] Unhappiness and +10% costs for [ICON_CULTURE] Social Policies[ENDCOLOR]

Remarkably, you fought against the Union on the side of the Confederacy. This came as a shock to many. You maintain that it was an issue of states' rights, and that the Union was going against the original spirit of America at the time.
There is no need for the people to know that.
